com.swirl

Class RegionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.swirl.Manager
      • com.swirl.RegionManager

  • public class RegionManager
extends Manager
    The RegionManager manages a working set of Region objects and determines based on receiving Location updates which regions are entered, which are exited and broadcasts that information onto the EventBus.

    An instance of this class is loaded and started by the library. You do not interact with this class directly.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RegionManager.RegionsChangedEvent
      A RegionsChangedEvent is generated whenever the RegionManager determines the set of entered or exited regions to have changed based on a location change.

      • getInstance

        public static RegionManager getInstance()
        Returns the last RegionManager created. Usually there is only one. It will return null if there is no RegionManager.
